name: VideoScribe Project
summary: A SCRIBE file is a project created by Sparkol VideoScribe, a program used to create animated whiteboard videos. It contains a project, which includes animations, images, audio, text, and project settings. SCRIBE files are used to share projects with other VideoScribe users to view and edit the same project.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: SCRIBE file open in Sparkol VideoScribe 3
